thread.title: Video: Britney Spears Has Wardrobe Malfunction at Las Vegas Show
thread.title_full: Video: Britney Spears Has Wardrobe Malfunction at Las Vegas Show

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Video: Britney Spears Has Wardrobe Malfunction at Las Vegas Show
text:
Comments Britney performs her song '3' with her zipper open after her backup dancers failed to fix it. 
Britney Spears had a bit of situation during her "Piece of Me" show at The Axis inside the Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino recently. The zipper of her see-through leotard opened in the middle of her "3" performance, but the show had to go on. The pop singer gestured her backup dancer to help her zip it back up while she continued doing the dance routine. Several of her male dancers tried to fix the zipper while she pranced around the stage, but it remained open until the song ended. As soon as the light dimmed, she was seen running backstage for costume change. Britney Spears began her Las Vegas residency show in late 2013. She originally signed a 2-year deal before expanding it later into another two year.
